middleware.js
¶

Module dependencies.

 
var utils = require('./utils');
¶

Initialization middleware, exposing the request and response to eachother, as well as defaulting the X-Powered-By header field.

Params
app Function
Returns
Function
API
private 

exports.init = function(app){
  return function expressInit(req, res, next){
    req.app = res.app = app;
    if (app.enabled('x-powered-by')) res.setHeader('X-Powered-By', 'Express');
    req.res = res;
    res.req = req;
    req.next = next;

    req.__proto__ = app.request;
    res.__proto__ = app.response;

    res.locals = res.locals || utils.locals(res);

    next();
  }
};
